doc.previous: Let be an arbitrary matrix of complex numbers with eigenvalues Here it is understood that an eigenvalue with algebraic multiplicity occurs times in this list Then
doc.after: The use of matrices with a single column rather than a single row to represent vectors is traditional in many disciplines For that reason the word eigenvector almost always means a right eigenvector namely a column vector that must be placed to the right of the matrix in the defining equation
